mapper.select: SELECT c.cseq, d.dseq ,d.name dname, s.sseq, s.name subname, p.name pname, s.time, c.result, t.id sid FROM excart c, department d, subject s, professor p, student t WHERE c.result = '1' AND c.sseq = s.sseq AND d.dseq = s.dseq AND p.id = s.id AND t.id = c.id AND t.id =#{sid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO excart(cseq, id, sseq) VALUES(excart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{sid}, #{sseq})
mapper.update: UPDATE excart SET result='2' WHERE cseq=#{cseq}
